titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to M. I. Forbes of Corse, his peaceable warning
titleStmt.author: Calderwood, David, 1575-1650.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Forbes, John. A peaceable warning, to the subjects in Scotland.
Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
